def_cn: 使…合理化;对…进行理性解释
def_en: If you try to rationalize attitudes or actions that are difficult to accept, you think of reasons to justify or explain them.

def_cn: 精简;（通常指通过削减员工和设备）使更有效率
def_en: When a company, system, or industry is rationalized, it is made more efficient, usually by getting rid of staff and equipment that are not essential.
